General.Name: Advantage Solutions Inc
General.Description: Advantage Solutions Inc. provides promotions agency services to clients worldwide. It offers sales agency, marketing agency, technology agency, retail agency, international, and business services. Advantage Solutions Inc. was formerly known as Karman Holding Corp. and changed its name to Advantage Solutions Inc. in March 2016. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Irvine, California.
General.Address: 18100 Von Karman Avenue, Irvine, CA, United States, 92612
